news.title: UK prosecutors say 21 charges authorised against Tate brothers
news.summary: Prosecutors in the UK confirm they have authorised 21 charges against Andrew and Tristan Tate, including rape, actual bodily harm and human trafficking.

news.title: The terrifying new weapon changing the war in Ukraine
news.summary: The BBC reports from Donetsk where swarms of fibre optic drones give Russia the edge as Ukraine defends towns behind the front line.

news.title: Heathrow chief slept as power outage closed airport, inquiry finds
news.summary: Findings from a review commissioned by Heathrow management into March's power cut are published.

news.title: French paedophile surgeon who abused hundreds sentenced to 20 years in jail
news.summary: Joel Le Scouarnec, who has admitted his guilt, said last week he neither wanted nor expected to be shown leniency.

news.title: BBC Verify examines footage of chaos at aid site in Gaza
news.summary: The UN Human Rights Office has said it believes 47 people were injured in Gaza on Tuesday when crowds overwhelmed an aid distribution centre run by a controversial US and Israeli-backed group.

news.title: Police given more time to question Liverpool parade suspect
news.summary: Police get an extension to continue questioning a man arrested on suspicion of attempted murder.

news.title: UK to hit 26C this weekend after sunniest spring on record
news.summary: Temperatures are set to rise across England and eastern Wales over the next few days, as this spring is confirmed as the sunniest on record.

news.title: EU says Israeli strikes in Gaza 'go beyond what is necessary' to fight Hamas
news.summary: Kaja Kallas, the EU's top diplomat, says the bloc also does not support a new aid distribution model which bypasses the UN and other humanitarian organisations.

news.title: Thames Water hit with biggest ever penalty over sewage and shareholder payouts
news.summary: Thames Water must pay a £104.5m penalty for sewage breaches and £18.2m relating to shareholder dividends.

news.title: Man wrongly identified as Liverpool parade driver speaks out
news.summary: Peter Cunningham had his picture circulated online alongside false claims he was driving the car that ploughed into crowds.
